ValidationRule.description: Confidence Level cannot be changed to high unless the Agreement status category is 'In Application' or 'In Effect'
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( RecordType.Name <> 'General', OR(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Confidence_Level__c), "Low Level"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Confidence_Level__c), "")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Apttus__Status_Category__c ,"In Effect")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Apttus__Status_Category__c ,"In Application")), ISPICKVAL(Confidence_Level__c ,"High Level")
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Confidence Level cannot be changed to 'High Level' unless the agreement is In Application or In Effect
